codeclient.config.dev_for_build.descript: Uses dev mode instead of build mode, clearing your inventory and teleporting you.
codeclient.config.chat_edits_vars.descri: Opening chat whilst holding a value will automatically put the contents in chat.
codeclient.config.insert_overlay.descrip: Click on an empty slot in a code chest to insert a value.
codeclient.config.param_ghosts.descripti: See and be able to hover parameter information in chest slots.
codeclient.config.command.query.fail: There is no option with name %s.
codeclient.config.command.fail: You cannot set this config option.

codeclient.phaser.plot_origin: CodeClient doesn't know the plot origin.
codeclient.phaser.dev_mode1: You cannot use phaser in build mode since %s to teleport.

There is a chance beta is broken and doesn't serve the Action Dump right now.

It will instead be printed in the console.
codeclient.action.confirmcc.use: Type /confirmcc to confirm this destructive action.
codeclient.warning.dev_mode: You must be in dev mode!
codeclient.warning.creative_mode: You must be in creative mode!

Click to teleport
x: %s, y: %s, z: %s
codeclient.files.hold_template: You need to hold a template to save.
codeclient.files.empty_dir: Please use an empty folder to save into.
codeclient.files.error.cant_delete: Couldn't delete the file or folder
codeclient.files.error.not_found: Couldn't find file or folder there.
codeclient.files.git: This is a git tracked directory
codeclient.files.open_native: Click to open it in file explorer.
codeclient.files.not_in_templates: That is not in the templates directory.
codeclient.api.authorised: The connecting app has now been authorized.
codeclient.api.warning: Authorizing apps allows them to do anything to your plot code, such as clearing and writing code.
codeclient.api.remove: You can remove the app by running /auth remove.
codeclient.api.removed: The connected app is no longer authorized.
